website_summaries.verdict: These appealing butterfly decals look great on an accent wall or behind the living room sofa.
pros: Set includes 28 total pieces, including large print text
All decals are removable and re-positionable on smooth surfaces
Butterfly theme has universal appeal, works in many rooms
cons: Adhesive can fail on certain surfaces
Elements are larger than some users may expect

customer_reviews.title: I LOVED how this came together in my nursery
customer_reviews.text: I LOVED how this came together in my nursery. I had previously purchased some other decals from RoomMates and they were high quality, easy to place, move, and ultimately remove. These stickers are very well printed, so much so that someone thought I had painted the butterflies.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith

customer_reviews.title: ... bathroom the roommates butterflies was just the thing I love it it makes my bathroom pop
customer_reviews.text: I live in an apartment and wanted to dress up my bathroom the roommates butterflies was just the thing I love it it makes my bathroom pop. So easy to apply and the stick well. I am 75 years old and I didn’t want to paint this gave a new look to my bathroom.
customer_reviews.author: egschwarze

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: They were just what I needed to finish a gift for graduation! I used them on a painted canvas! They were easy to it on and if I didn't like the way it looked it was easy to remove. Beautiful and colorful. I had some left over so I am giving them to the person so she can put them on her wall around the canvas to look like the butterflies are flying off and on the canvas. I will be buying this brand in the future. I had bought another brand of a different pattern and it would not go on the canvas right so it ended in the trash, money wasted!
customer_reviews.author: sandra miller

customer_reviews.title: This is such a great product! I have used a lot of sticky ...
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great product! I have used a lot of sticky decals before and these are some of the best. They came off the backing easily and they stuck well to the wall. I even had to move one of the words a couple times and it still stuck on the wall well.
customer_reviews.author: T. Saporito

customer_reviews.title: Great inexpensive way to brighten up the drab
customer_reviews.text: We installed a new safety shower. While it was necessary, the utilitarian look was stark and a little depressing. I have never seen any pictures of these type of stickers being used in a shower, but I figured I'd give it a try. I love them! They've been up for 2 months so far with no signs of peeling or damage. I just take a towel and pat them down when finished. They've made our stark, boring safety shower pretty and whimsical. All our guests comment on how lovely it looks. When they finally do fall off, I will definitely replace them.
customer_reviews.author: Walter Button

customer_reviews.title: Sustained massive peel and repositions without fail!
customer_reviews.text: I didnt expect to use them this way but I like it a lot. I cant even tell you how many times I peeled them off and repositioned them... and never did they fail. I kept waiting to ruin them in the process and they sustained what I did. !!!! These are great.
customer_reviews.author: Krista Um

customer_reviews.title: Imaginative Wall Decor
customer_reviews.text: These butterflys are surreal creations for one's wall. Once applied they bring life to a dead space. I affixed the wall art to a desolate space on the bathroom wall. I used my imagination to form them up differently than what the picture shows. These hand painted butterflys from Lisa Audit create an etrancing display. I combined these butterflys with other Lisa Audit's vinyl wall art to create a mesmerizing exhibition. Easy to lose 30 minutes gazing at the vision that has been created. I am pleased with this kit.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Myrick

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply on the walls of my room
customer_reviews.text: Easy to apply on the walls of my room. If you don't like how it looks then you can easily take it of and put them somewhere else. The colors are very nice, not too bright, so this can be used for any room in the house. The butterflies were much bigger than I thought but still looks great. Would recommend to anyone who wants to decorate their room
customer_reviews.author: Elisa

customer_reviews.title: Love them "flutter-byes"
customer_reviews.text: I've always enjoyed beautiful butterflies but when my little great-granddaughter saw them in our backyard, she called them flutter-byes and the name stuck. Now when she sees them in the house she just ooooh's and aaaah's them and can't stop looking at them. They add a lovely touch to making our house more of a home again.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon R

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and well made
customer_reviews.text: Can't say enough about these: beautifully painted (watercolor) and beautifully printed. The decal is of high quality, easily placeable and removable and replaceable. I use them inside my trailer and outside, no problems so far in all sort of weather after one summer of camping. LOVE them.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Grace

customer_reviews.title: Easy to apply and remove
customer_reviews.text: My daughter ordered this to redo her and her sisters bathroom in our home. She swears that it’s so easy to use and remove and place some where else. We are not sure how long it will last in the bathroom with the steam from the girls showers but we will find out soon enough ( other saying was not as easy To apply and the extra butterflies were brought from Lowe’s). Overall she’s happy with the outcome
customer_reviews.author: Jewel B

customer_reviews.title: Great and beautiful butterflies
customer_reviews.text: They are such lovely butterflies I put them in my laundry room and you get so many Im ordering more for the laundry room thank you for a great price and a great product
customer_reviews.author: Mr and Mrs

customer_reviews.title: Tons of Butterflies - Easy to Apply and Remove
customer_reviews.text: We bought these to replace a different set from quite a few years ago. They look great and there were enough butterflies to decorate two girls' rooms. They stick well, yet are easy to remove and re-adjust placement or remove completely when redecorating. As in the photo, these look best on light colored paint, but they still look nice in one of the rooms with dark colored paint.
customer_reviews.author: DocMom2Four

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Love Love these stickers. They are easy to take down and reposition I had a hard time figuring out where to put them so I kept having to take them down and put them up again & that didn’t make them loose any stickiness! Stickers were bigger than expected an even bigger plus!
customer_reviews.author: Tyesha

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty!!
customer_reviews.text: So many beautiful butterflies and colors. It has 4 sheets of different sizes and colors. They come off like clear stickers and go right on. They can also be taken off easily, because I moved them around quite a bit. The wording is in a light blue, and doesn't stand out on dark furniture. Recommend using on a wall or light colored furniture. I bought this for my desk and it looks very nice, but I know if the desk was white or a lighter colored it would pop! Still happy with them!
customer_reviews.author: Marlene

customer_reviews.title: Good product - colors are more like water colors
customer_reviews.text: Great product, Used on my bathroom walls, good range of butterfly stickers in color and size, easy to put on and remove - and it lasts even in the small steamy bathroom. One point to improve is the colors, the pictures showed lively colors, and the colors in reality are more like water colors, they're pretty, but not what I expected
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I can't believe how easy this is
customer_reviews.text: these stickers are amazing I just moved into an apartment where the whole bedroom wall is a closet with these white sliding doors and I just put this up in about 3 minutes and I'm in love with it
customer_reviews.author: elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing residue on removal
customer_reviews.text: The stickers were pretty but when I removed them, there were imprints on my wall in the outline of the stickers. I had to repaint my wall. I have used other brands without this issue.
customer_reviews.author: Best Mommy

customer_reviews.title: I would definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.text: I have old half tiled walls I painted over in my bathroom and I applied these all over the tiles. They worked great have stayed perfect through steam heat and air conditioning. I ha e moved and adjusted a few with no problem. I got two sets because I had a large area to cover. I used on!y one saying on the wall and it all looks great with no outlines.
customer_reviews.author: Karen

customer_reviews.title: Decorate your wall when you can't hang picture
customer_reviews.text: Great way to decorate your way when your apartment does not allow you to hang pictures. Stays on for 2 months already and still easy to peel off. I only wish the background is transparent in color since my wall is darker shades of beige. I will buy more if there are more selection which are not for kids.
customer_reviews.author: Blessed Rain

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Decal
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this decal for my classroom. The decals are easy to apply and easy to remove. It does not pull the paint off of the wall. The artwork is very detailed. It adds a beautiful touch to any room. My parents and students are very pleased with the home like feel.
customer_reviews.author: Marlene N. Harvest

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty
customer_reviews.text: I bought this item a few years ago from Walmart. I really liked it but didn't want to spend as much to buy another one. When I saw the price for this item here on Amazon I jumped on it. The decals are beautiful and I love the product. It came right on time.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Lady

customer_reviews.title: Simple Decoration with Impact
customer_reviews.text: It might have been nice to have a few sample layouts, but it was fun to put the text in place and slowly add the flock of butterflies to my bathroom wall. It’s only been up for a few weeks, but so far, it’s sticking fast. Plenty of compliments about the way it looks, too.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon L Hughson

customer_reviews.title: Great product and so beautiful
customer_reviews.text: So easy to install and turns out beautiful. My 11-year-old daughter and I had lots of fun Putting it together. I will definitely buy again from this brand.
customer_reviews.author: Channaly McBride

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: Easy to put on. I have had these on for about a month and still sticking to the wall, no issues with it not sticking. I came with lot of butterflies.
customer_reviews.author: lamrks

customer_reviews.title: So pretty.
customer_reviews.text: I used these in my bathroom. They are beautiful. There were so many not only are they in the bathroom also on my closet doors in the bedroom. Would be so cute in a nursery or girl's room. Very durable. I just wipe them down about once a week with a damp cloth. Excellent buy!
customer_reviews.author: Marcia L.

customer_reviews.title: The "&" symbol is larger than ALL the letters as advertised!😉
customer_reviews.text: Nice... just wish all the words were separate adhesives for easier install and various creativity. ...Also, not sure why the "&" symbol is larger than ALL the letters🤔... noticeably "off" looking....I guess the butterflies make up for it🙃
customer_reviews.author: Sweet

customer_reviews.title: Sticks to metal very well, stays so far in rain and sun outside
customer_reviews.text: Nice, I put this on a traffic box by my girls house, to say love you. It's been there a while now, rain and shine, no problems shrinking or falling off. Easy to apply and take off. Makes people smile when they see them.
customer_reviews.author: Mark simmons

customer_reviews.title: Love the design and easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: Bought for new office - love! I did also see this set at Walmart and this was less expensive. Has an adhesive smell to it... take out of packaging helps - you will need to unfold it and weigh it down to take the kinks out.
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Had to add adhesive putty...
customer_reviews.text: Beginning to peel off after 2 weeks... prolly best on glass not semi textured walls or humidity...
customer_reviews.author: Andre B.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: These are beautiful and realistic looking for a more mature child’s room. Not cartoonish but still young and whimsical. My 7 year old adores them. They were the perfect touch to make her room in our new house feel like her own.
customer_reviews.author: askeatons

customer_reviews.title: Colorful and easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: I remodeled a small camper for my mom and bought these to decorate. She loves butterflies and it worked well in the camper. She loves them. They go on easy and are just as easy to remove and adjust. Colors are beautiful. We both love them.
customer_reviews.author: T. L. Wi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for my project.
customer_reviews.text: I redid an old jewelry box for my niece for Christmas. I painted it and wanted to put some transfers on it, but was unable to find anything small enough and that I though a young girl would like. These to the rescue. I cut them out individually and applied all over the box, wrapping the saying around it as well. Super cute. Everyone loved it.
customer_reviews.author: deenat

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my classroom and I get a ton of compliments. I was concerned at first because my walls have painted fabric, but they are sticking well. So easy to put up, I just needed someone to stand back and let me know it was straight. Love the butterflys!
customer_reviews.author: Lori S. Combs

customer_reviews.title: Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: My decals arrived in a timely manner packaged securely. I found them very easy to apply to my painted wall and also easy to rearrange them after a day of being on the wall. I removed several and arranged them to suit me better. I'm very happy with them and have received several compliments on how nice they look.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen & Wanda

customer_reviews.title: These are lovely decals with very good coloring.
customer_reviews.text: I did not dislike anything about these decals but liked the colors and the ease of removing them if necessary. I redid a picture using these decals and was more than please with the results.
customer_reviews.author: Maureen J. Wojciechowski

customer_reviews.title: Love these!
customer_reviews.text: I love these! They're so easy to remove and arrange differently if you want to. I'll definitely buy from this company again. I wish the S in the first word (Spread) was a little bigger. However, it's still a beautiful set.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Colorful butterflies
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love these. I put these on mom's wall in assisted living, it's colorful and made the room much more cheerful. They stick to the wall quite well, can also be easily removed with no damages to the wall.
customer_reviews.author: Grace L

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous and dazzling colors
customer_reviews.text: This turned out absolutely gorgeous on the wall. Once you understand how to put these up they are a breeze. I am now into wall decals. My eight year old granddaughter fell in love with this whole thing
customer_reviews.author: Sharona

customer_reviews.title: Added some brightness to my RV
customer_reviews.text: I used these peel and sticks to decorate in my RV. They are so bright and fun! Easy to apply, easy to remove, and easy to reapply. I love peel and sticks.
customer_reviews.author: Jayme Beyrer

customer_reviews.title: Really look good!
customer_reviews.text: These are even better than I expected. I needed dark sunglasses due to an eye problem and still wanted something that looked good. These glasses were perfect! I'm happy and my eyes are doing better. Good price also!
customer_reviews.author: M. Bonnem

customer_reviews.title: Variety of colors & Easy Application
customer_reviews.text: Liked the tone of colors, as we'll as, the variety. Bought it to decorate my walls to reflect how I feel about my little one movements in my tummy. My pregnancy has been delicate, special and precious.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly Ebanks

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful but does not last long
customer_reviews.text: My daughter was so excited when she saw these but it keeps falling/ peeling off a day after I put it in her newly painted wall. It is really disappointing because every night my daughter keeps putting it back to the wall for about now because she does not want to throw it away.
customer_reviews.author: william gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Very nice accent
customer_reviews.text: Gave 4 stars as they will only stick to smooth surfaces (shower wall) unless you use a general purpose spray adhesive to secure to a wall or other textured surface
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: Beautifull
customer_reviews.text: Come in two long sheets, I pressed them flat for a week with heavy books on them. A bit transparent. Easy to apply and reposition if needed. colorful and just lovely. Happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: not sticky enough
customer_reviews.text: they were cute and easy to use but keep falling off my wall! everything else ive ever stuck on my walls stick but these will not! only half are staying up there right now.
customer_reviews.author: Baeli Chenoweth

customer_reviews.title: I love butterflies
customer_reviews.text: Spread your wings and fly. Freedom and transformation are my thoughts of butterflies and I’m really happy with this decor. Very beautiful and positive
customer_reviews.author: Gerie W

customer_reviews.title: Looks really nice!
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty! These are very easy to put on the wall and easy to remove and does not leave any marks or stains on the walls. They are a pretty and colorful accent to any wall.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This looks great in the hallway.... Has been up for a long time and no problems and issues....
customer_reviews.author: Happy Shopping

customer_reviews.title: relaxing
customer_reviews.text: What can I say except that the decals are beautiful. My wife put the collage on one of our walls. Sometimes I just sit and look at butterfly's and just unwind.
customer_reviews.author: Robert K.

customer_reviews.title: VERY EASY TO PUT ON WALL.
customer_reviews.text: You can remove these butterflies and put in a different location several times. They stay on firmly and look amazing!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great on office wall
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to put on my office wall at a clubhouse for teens. It gives them a calm place to sit and or talk.
customer_reviews.author: Susan

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality, Easy Application
customer_reviews.text: I ordered many vinyl wall sets from various companies for my new childcare program. This set was by far the easiest to apply, clings well even on a slightly textured wall and overall is excellent quality. Wishing I bought more from this company now!
customer_reviews.author: Heather Rindlisbacher

customer_reviews.title: Color and Fun
customer_reviews.text: Very nice addition to the room where my granddaughter always stays. Easy Peasy to apply and remove and reapply. Love these BFs
customer_reviews.author: David Mortensen

customer_reviews.title: When you don’t want to put holes in your wall.
customer_reviews.text: These decals look beautiful in our spare bedroom. Muted colors add just the right amount of color that we wanted.
customer_reviews.author: CGO

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: First experience with decals and I love them! They are super easy to use and quickly brighten up a room.
customer_reviews.author: EB

customer_reviews.title: Colorful and easy to move around
customer_reviews.text: I moved the decals three times before I decided where to place them. I’m really happy with them. Just be careful that they don’t fold and get tangled. (Still able to straighten them out )
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: BEAUTIFUL
customer_reviews.text: I love butterflies. I have these beauties flying across my bedroom wall. It makes me happy when I enter the room and with a little imagination, they actually look real.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for girls bedroom
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for girls bedroom!!! Stuck to wall very well even after moving a few stickers around. Great price for what you get!
customer_reviews.author: sarah

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what I needed
customer_reviews.text: Decorated my bathroom wall. Muted colors did not detract from the rest of the room. Excellent product.
customer_reviews.author: suzanne

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty and easy to apply
customer_reviews.text: Used the decals in a guest bedroom. Very pretty... and very easy to apply, had to change the spacing several times and the decals were very easy to remove and re-apply. Very happy with the result and the purchase
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: This set of decals ad such a special touch to the bedroom. My daughter loves them! The really look nice.

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and doesn’t mar walls/doors
customer_reviews.text: This is beautiful, my daughter put it on her door and I tested that it could easily come down and it does.

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Wonderful come off sheet smoothly I used them on glass doors and the look fantastic. I have cleaned the door once and no issues. Would buy again.

customer_reviews.title: Cost, appearance and application are good
customer_reviews.text: Fun for the butterfly lover like me. Plenty included for the price. I used every one without not one falling off the walls. Adheres great.
customer_reviews.author: Not received product yet

customer_reviews.title: love them :)
customer_reviews.text: shipped timely ... easily adheres to walls and stays stuck until I remove them ... I placed these on my bathroom walls ... they stay stuck even with my hot, steamy showers
customer_reviews.author: Brenda

customer_reviews.title: nice quality
customer_reviews.text: several butterflies...nicer quality than I have ordered before. Easily removed and replaced in a rental property. worked nice.

customer_reviews.title: nice
customer_reviews.text: this was easy to put on and mkes my wall stand out. nicer and bigger then i thought.

customer_reviews.title: Turned out beautifully!
customer_reviews.text: So easy to apply (and adjust/reapply)! My 9 yr old loves them & we had fun doing this together.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful..easy to put up...excellent quality..not flimsy and very durable. Made a great finish to my Amazon tile wall!

customer_reviews.title: So beautiful! 🦋💞
customer_reviews.text: My bathroom was too plain, so I wanted to add a little something to it. These butterflies were perfect! They are so beautiful in person, pictures don’t do them justice! They look like they are painted on, instead of stickers! I love them! Totally recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa hernandez

customer_reviews.title: Ok buy
customer_reviews.text: The words kept getting stuck together...it was quite difficult getting them applied to my wall.
customer_reviews.author: kimmi

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy material for wall, but very elegant
customer_reviews.text: We had little bad patch on the wall. We could successfully disguise it. In the process the wall became beutifully decorated!
customer_reviews.author: AD

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Purchase
customer_reviews.text: The butterfly decals were of excellent quality. I was able to remove easily from backing. They were cut perfectly. Decent size as well to cover a large wall. Colors looked great too.
customer_reviews.author: Terree

customer_reviews.title: Just as described, though I would have preferred the ...
customer_reviews.text: Just as described, though I would have preferred the colors more vibrant than the muted grays tones in the colors.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent value for the money. Hung these in my granddaughters nursey and. Very easy to apply, remove, move, and restick

customer_reviews.text: Pretty but really BIG! I couldn't use them for what I needed. Bummed

customer_reviews.title: great office decor
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my office. Have had several comments on them. Very easy to apply and very pretty too

customer_reviews.title: Great product  will buy again.
customer_reviews.text: Nothing bad to say about this product. Will buy it again and definitely recommend.

customer_reviews.text: This was easy to install and looks very vibrant on my wall. Adhesion is great and has so far not been affected by moisture. Very happy with my purchase.

customer_reviews.title: Easiest to use. Good Quality.
customer_reviews.text: This was the easiest letters to use. Good quality. Easy to work with. Teally pretty. Butterflies have alot of detail on them.

customer_reviews.text: I really am happy with this product. It is perfect for my “she shack”. Very easy to do and it sticks well to textured wall!!

customer_reviews.text: Bought these to cover up some scratches on my wall. Didn't need to paint just yet. They work perfect. I have received many compliments.

customer_reviews.title: Pleased

customer_reviews.title: It was liked

customer_reviews.text: I love the ease and the look of this wall decal! Totally satisfied.

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty! I very much recommend you buy them.
customer_reviews.text: We just love our butterfly decals. They go on easy and can be moved around and still stick. I bought 5 total sets. For myself and family. Everybody loves them. Great price too.

customer_reviews.text: I cut out individually and used on projects. Worked nicely!

customer_reviews.title: Good decals
customer_reviews.text: Used in my bathroom. Easy to put up. You can remove it and stick it somewhere else & it's still sticky. Happy with this purchase!

product_meta.title: RoomMates RMK3263SCS Lisa Audit Butterfly Quote Peel And Stick Wall Decals, Multicolor
product_meta.description:
Enchanted butterflies and meaningful quotes come together to create charming room décor with Lisa Audit Butterfly Quote Wall Decals by RoomMates Décor. Designed with the quote “Spread Your Wings and Fly” surrounded by colorful butterflies, Lisa Audit Butterfly Quote Wall Decals delight any room with ease. A fast and affordable way to quickly add color and meaning to your room décor, add these wall stickers to any clean, flat surface in minutes. To apply, simply peel each of the twenty-eight wall decals from the high quality backing and stick them to any smooth, flat surface. That’s it! Even better, remove and reposition wall decals over and over again leaving walls free of any sticky residue or damage.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
Since 2006, RoomMates, the world’s largest manufacturer of peel and stick decorative products, has enabled consumers across the globe to transform their walls and other room accessories quickly, effortlessly and affordably.
RoomMates offers the largest, most varied (and we like to think “coolest”) selection of Wall Decals and Peel & Stick Wallpapers that install, reposition and remove in seconds without ever leaving any sticky residue or damage to the surface. Our Peel & StickTiles enable you to create a backsplash in minutes giving you the opportunity for a fun, fast, easy and always great-looking room/accessory make-over. Just Peel, Stick and done! 
Turn an ordinary space, furniture or accessory into anything but ordinary with RoomMates.
